articles.content: Smaller company stocks fell more than the broader market. The Russell 2000 small-cap index slid 19.76 points, or 0.9 per cent, to 2,231.21. The index, the biggest gainer so far this year, clawed back… [+4095 chars]

articles.description: Crown's $210 million JobKeeper bill should be scrutinised in Victoria's wide-ranging royal commission, independent state senator Fiona Patten has said.
